Replace.Text: Unlocks the ability of Alice Priests to build Alice's Abbey, a unique improvement in the Free Iris. [NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing, +2 Charisma. +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each adjacent wonder, +1 for each adjacent region [ICON_Gold] Gold, +1 for each adjacent camp [ICON_FOOD] Food, +1 for each adjacent pasture +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity. And after unlocking the corresponding municipal government, you will get more bonuses. Allowed to be built on forests and some luxury resources, but not adjacent to another Alice Monastery.

Free Iris featured area, replacing Holy Land. When you first build the Iris Court, you will receive a Great Seer. Provides additional +1 [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist Points per round and +1 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician Points per round. [NEWLINE] +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each adjacent Alice Monastery, +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every two adjacent grassland cells, +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each adjacent area.
Alice bathed in the Holy Light
Buildings in the downtown area can be purchased using [ICON_Faith] Faith. -20% cost when purchasing units using [ICON_Faith] Faith.
Free Iris' unique civilian unit. Can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith. You can build some cell improvements, remove landforms, or harvest resources. Priest Alice can be used 4 times.

Bishop Richelieu, you are the revelation of the Lord. God loves the world and gives you great wisdom to lead the people, so that everyone who believes in Him will not perish but be blessed. Your devout people's faith in God has brought about great art, from architecture to literature, from the sky to the sea, and the light of faith shines throughout the land. Glory to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit, as in the beginning, so today, and forever. Amen.
All your own cities with Holy Land will release pressure, with the same effect as the Holy City. Apostle units can choose any available upgrade instead of being randomly upgraded.
Will you sign a friendly covenant with me?
Peace is restored, and may you also receive God's blessings.
Faith and hard work are empty words that anyone can say, but to truly establish them, it often requires countless pains and sacrifices. Please come back.
The trial is over, please let peace return to us.
We allow your armies to pass through our Lord's territory for the time being.
The sacred land does not allow infidels to come and desecrate it, please go back.
Our faith will spread far and wide, please allow us to pass through your territory.
I found that your troops are near our border. This affects our prayers. Please withdraw your troops.
I am Cardinal Richelieu, fleet leader of the Free Iris. If you also fight for faith and freedom, I think we can become friends.
Bonjour, would you like to come to our nearest city and pray with us?
Can we exchange capital information? This facilitates free iris trade and religious exchanges with you.
Bonjour, is there anything you can trade?
Trust me, follow me and you will get what you want. Pray and search, the bright road, the happiness in your hands, and a brand new day will all appear before your eyes.
Those who do not think about progress will eventually lead to destruction. Keep this in mind.
(Richelieu thinks you are a person of faith)
(You are violating the teachings of Free Iris)
In the name of the sacred iris, may you also receive God's blessings.
Liberty Iris celebrates peace and freedom. Sorry, it seems you haven’t received God’s blessing yet.
Even the most devout believers cannot survive by faith alone. Are you willing to declare a covenant of friendship with me?
Thank you, and may you also receive God’s blessings.
.......Now is the time for prayer, please come back.
...Only courage deserves a little appreciation. In the name of liberty and glory, aux armes, marchons!
Those who have sinned deeply shall accept divine punishment!
Is this also...a trial given by the gods...
Liberty Iris has agreed to host your delegation and I will lead your delegation in prayer.
Sorry, the Lord does not allow me to accept your kindness.
I will send a delegation to give you some gifts, and may you also receive God's blessings.
The remaining sinners in the world! You will finally get eternal peace and salvation, amen...
I will spread heaven's blessings throughout the world, but now demons and sinners still exist on earth. Remember, divine punishment never fails! (condemn you)
I like countries with many holy places and dislike countries with low faith.
